snippet.title: Monaco 2 Devlog #2
snippet.description:
Monaco 2 is in development!
Wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1063030/Monaco_2
Discord: http://discord.gg/pocketwatch
Twitch: http://twitch.tv/pocketwatch

Monaco 2 uses procedurally generated levels.  How do we plan to preserve the magic of Monaco 1's hand-crafted levels, with all their easter eggs, devilish traps, and environmental storytelling, while also taking advantage of randomness to encourage improvisation?

Markov chains, directed graphs, room editors and more!

...also, listen closely for another sneak peak of Austin Wintory's work-in-progress.
